Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.4.2.2110 Windows 64-bit, updated from v1.4.1.2089

What Happens: "From the Mun" tutorial cannot be played due to bugs.

Mods / Add-Ons: MechJeb & Kerbal Engineer (I don't think they can be the cause of the problem)

Steps to Replicate:

1) Run "From the Mun" tutorial

2) Wait for the physics to be eased

Result: 
v1.4.2.2110:
Landing legs will be destroyed and the vessel will bounce as the physics get eased, when vessel hits back to the surface, engine is destroyed and vessel is flipped over. Even if we burn the engine mid-air, tutorial seems to reject warping to the apoapsis, vessel is shown as "Landed" during flight.
v1.4.1.2089:
Vessel will bounce as the physics engine start calculations, when vessel lands back, it will flip over, making it impossible to take off again.

Fixes/Workarounds:

- Ascending during the bounce works well, though it doesn't fix everything for v1.4.2.2110 (as stated above).

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

- Video of the bug from v1.4.2.2110 (Upload failed, will retry tomorrow if required)

- Video of the bug from v1.4.1.2089

Edited March 28, 2018 by FurkanS1821
